EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-09-28-NYC Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-09-25-Confirmation-1.EMA
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Soon at Chelsea Piers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I hope you are as excited as I am to hang out with the Turbonomic and Presidio crew Thursday evening at the Golf Club at Chelsea Piers. I'm reaching out with final details for Thursday's event. When you arrive, please check-in in the lobby area under Turbonomic and you will be shown to our reserved pitching bays. Thursday, September 28th, 5:30 p.m. EST The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers <[[https://www.chelseapiers.com/golf/driving-range/overview/]]> 59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011
Click here for additional venue information <[[https://www.chelseapiers.com/golf/]]>
We're looking forward to seeing you there,
Megan
Megan Gay Marketing Program Manager Turbonomic, Inc.
